title: vanna mayil vAhanan
sahitya:
vanna mayil vAhanan vaLLi magizh mOhanan ponnaDiyE enadu pughaliDamAghiDumE


anupallavi

  tannaiyE nambinOr innalurum pOdu annai pOl aNaiyum anbinai uDaiyavan


caraNam    arupaDai vIDODu aLavillA aruLODu pAriDai nigharillA sIruDan tigazhvOn
kAruNya svrUpanAi kATSi taruvOnAi sArum aDiyAriDar tIra dayai purivOn
